title: [SOLVED]820-2849 no bluetooth
message: Hi guys, got this 17 inch 2849 in with no BT, wifi working fine. Replace the AIrport card and same issue, also tried a clean OS. Never fixed this issue before other then just swapping the card where to start?

title: [SOLVED]820-2849 no bluetooth
message: Bluetooth is just an USB device, check L3404, maybe it is open also check voltage on both pins ftom L3406....

title: [SOLVED]820-2849 no bluetooth
message: Found the issue, tiny liquid spil on the cable/connector! Swapped cable and all good, thanks!
